body.name: TOTO Drake Two-Piece Round 1.6 GPF Universal Height TORNADO FLUSH Toilet with CEFIONTECT, Cotton White - CST775CSFG#01
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 7 hrs 40 mins
features: POWERFUL PERFORMANCE WITH LESS FREQUENT CLEANING - TORNADO FLUSH swirls water in a circular pattern to fully wash the bowl surface. CEFIONTECT is an ultra-smooth glaze that minimizes waste from sticking so that it is easily washed away.

MORE COMFORT ACROSS A WIDER RANGE OF INDIVIDUALS - TOTO's Universal Height is taller than a standard toilet and makes sitting down and standing up easier for many people. Universal Height models are capable of meeting the ADA height requirement.

REDUCE WATER USEAGE WITHOUT SACRIFICE - The 1.6 gallon per flush Drake enables you to save water without worrying about diminished performance. The Drake features a wide 3 inch flush valve and a siphon jet bowl that gets the job done in one flush.

STYLISH AND MODERN DESIGN - Update your oasis with this stylish design that couples well with any bathroom décor. The round bowl helps to save space in your bathroom. The toilet fits into 12 inch rough-in installations and has a left-hand trip lever.

COMPLETE YOUR TOILET - Finish your purchase with the addition of a TOTO SoftClose seat or upgrade to a WASHLET bidet seat. Drake tank and bowl with hardware included. Purchased Separately: Wax ring, flange bolts, and water supply lines.
body.description: The TOTO® Drake® Two-Piece Round 1.6 GPF Universal Height TORNADO FLUSH® Toilet with CEFIONTECT® is a beautifully designed high profile toilet. The Drake features TOTO’s TORNADO FLUSH®, a rimless, hole-free design with dual-nozzles that creates a centrifugal washing action that assists in rinsing the bowl more efficiently. This version of the TOTO Drake includes CEFIONTECT®, a layer of exceptionally smooth glaze that minimizes waste from sticking to the ceramic. CEFIONTECT, coupled with TORNADO FLUSH, assists to reduce the frequency of toilet cleanings, minimizing the usage of water, harsh chemicals, and time required for cleaning. This version of the TOTO Drake is designed in TOTO’s Universal Height, which allows for a more comfortable seat position across a wide range of users. This version of the Drake has a left-hand chrome trip lever and is ADA compliant. The Drake bowl and tank set includes a tank to bowl gasket, tank to bowl hardware, and toilet bolt caps. Additional items needed for installation and use must be purchased separately: wax ring, toilet mounting bolts, water supply lines, and toilet seat.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us At TOTO, we design simple, brilliant, elegant solutions for basic human needs. That means a TOTO bathroom is always more than a routine. It’s a ritual where every innovation, every detail, is designed with you in mind. For over 100 years TOTO has been dedicated to improving lives around the globe through tirelessly designing and engineering products that deliver innovative technology while still maintaining the beauty expected from TOTO. POWERFUL PERFORMANCE, DEPENDABLE CLEAN Drake Two-Piece Round 1.6 GPF Toilet The Drake Two-Piece Round Universal Height TORNADO FLUSH Toilet with CEFIONTECT is intentionally designed with cleanliness in mind. The Drake features a rimless, hole-free design with dual nozzles that create a highly efficient centrifugal washing action for better bowl rinse after each flush. With the assistance of the CEFIONTECT exceptionally smooth glaze, waste is prevented from adhering to the surface, ensuring the toilet bowl stays cleaner longer. ADA Compliant to serve the needs of everyone regardless of their needs without additional adaptation. Designed with quality materials to ensure longevity and durability. Available in additional colors and features to maximize benefits and coordinate with all bathroom spaces.

Effective, Efficient, and Environmentally Focused Cleaning System Powerful Flushing System Our TORNADO FLUSH flushing system generates 360-degrees of cleaning power that reaches every spot. Advanced Clean Technology Our CEFIONTECT ceramic glaze minimizes waste from sticking to porous ceramic surfaces. Improved Water Spot A large water spot that reduces the places where waste can cling to the bowl. Simplified Cleaning The rimless design eliminates places where waste can build up and makes it easier to clean.

Everything You'll Need to Experience Next-Level Clean Everything you need is within reach! This model will come with both tank and toilet bowl included. Simply purchase compatible seat, installation hardware and wax ring. Elevate your experience by upgrading to one of our TOTO WASHLET Electronic Bidet seats, delivering next-level clean and a pampered spa-like feeling after each use.

Choose the Drake That's Right for You! Newly Designed with Everyone in Mind TOTO's Drake Toilet comes in a variety of options to fit your unique needs and complement your bathroom space. Available in standard or Universal Height, 1.28 or 1.6 GPF, 10 or 12 inch rough-in sizes, and with trip levers located on the left or right side of the tank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The throne to get
reviews.reviewText: I have never been more impress by a toilet than this toto. The Drake is the absolute best toilet. The tornado flush is the nice and powerful, the design is modern and clean. The best money spent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great flushing toilet-Worth the extra money!
reviews.reviewText: Well I wasn't sure about the side lever. Now I like it better. This thing flushes great! No double flushing yet. The bowl stays clean with special coating. Yes, it cost more, but when worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's a great product, a great little toilet, I've bought 3 direct from plumbing companies, but Amazon clear;ly doesn't know how to package something heavy like this! Broken!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent purchase. Best toilet we have had. Jet engine swoosh.
reviews.reviewText: Excellent purchase. Best toilet we have had. Jet engine. Easy to clean and powerful flush. A+

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2022
reviews.reviewText: A superior toilet minimizes the need for a plunger and a brush. The Toto toilet flushes very well making plunging a rare event. However, some waste deposits can cling to the under water surfaces requiring multiple flushes or a brush to remove them. The toilet flush also seems louder than others, but this is probably necessary for the superior flushing. Components in the tank appear to be high quality which is good as replacements are unlikely to be found at your local hardware store. Very glad I bought it but it is not a 5 star product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Design and Functionality
reviews.reviewText: Liked it so much I purchased another for our second bathroom. One of each, a round bowl and an elongated bowl. They work like a charm! (TOTO is a Japanese brand and design but made in Mexico for the Americas)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My installer was impressed that the fittings were aligned in an easy to install manner. The rear of the base sits considerably closer to the wall and existing water valve, which may make cleaning behind it a challenge, however, the overall look of the toilet is neat and clean.Be aware that the wax ring and bolts are not included.The toilet flushes smoothly and efficiently, so much better than the 30 year old one it replaced and the bowl seems to stay clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The tank did not match the base of the toilet. The tank was cream and the base is white. Even though I ordered white and the box said white.
